text: idk if it counts, but <http://developers.HubSpot.com|developers.HubSpot.com> is running on CMS Hub :slightly_smiling_face:

ahhh yeah to <@UJAPS2K4N>â€™s answer. I think I read your question wrong <@U0239SDK509>. Like Anton said, the font field only supports google fonts. Anything else is just added like any other custom font. See the `{{ require_css() }}` function if you want to include something like typekit fonts from an external stylesheet. Otherwise you can you the filemanager link, or include a font in you theme and reference it via `{{ get_asset_url( './path/to/font.woff' ) }}`

Is there a way to reduce the number of messages that the HubSpot Autoupload webpack plugin sends to console?
```[HubSpotAutoUploadPlugin] Uploaded the-brand-theme/templates/system/search/search-results.html to account XXXXXX```
